sentences.sContent: Detach the white part of the application form and keep it for reference only.
sentences.sCn: 取下申请表的白色部分，仅备参考。

sentences.sContent: They clambered back under the falls to detach the raft from a jagged rock.
sentences.sCn: 他们爬回到瀑布下面以便将卡在锯齿状岩石间的小艇拉出来。

remMethod.val: de (分离) + tach (看作touch， 接触) → 不接触 → 分开

words.tran: 可分开的；可拆开的；可分遣的
分离，拆开；超然；分遣；分遣队

trans.tranOther: If you detach one thing from another that it is attached to, you remove it. If one thing detaches from another, it becomes separated from it.
